thing-type.label: Pigpio Remote
thing-type.description: The remote pigpio thing represents a remote raspberry pi with pigpio installed. Pins are channels.

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: Network address of the Raspberry Pi.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Port of pigpio on the remote Raspberry Pi.

parameter.name: heartBeatInterval
parameter.label: Heart Beat Interval
parameter.description: Time in ms to send CMD_TICK calls on the communication socket. Used to detect and recover from pigpiod disconnects.

parameter.name: inputConnectAction
parameter.label: Input Channel Connect Action
parameter.description: When a pigpiod connection is first established after binding INITIALIZATION. The desired action to perform on input channels. REFRESH: Send a REFRESH command to the channel. NOTHING: Leave all channels at their current state.

parameter.name: inputDisconnectAction
parameter.label: Input Channel Disconnect Action
parameter.description: When a pigpiod disconnect is encountered. The desired action to perform on input channel. SETUNDEF: Set all configured channels to UNDEF. NOTHING: Leave all channels at their current state.

parameter.name: inputReconnectAction
parameter.label: Input Channel Reconnect Action
parameter.description: When a pigpiod connection is re-established after being disconnected. The desired action to perform on input channels. REFRESH: Send a REFRESH command to the channel. NOTHING: Leave all channels at their current state.

parameter.name: outputConnectAction
parameter.label: Output Channel Connect Action
parameter.description: When a pigpiod connection is first established after binding INITIALIZATION. The desired action to perform on outputs. ALLOFF: Update the GPIO pin to OFF. ALLON: Update the GPIO pin to ON. REFRESH: Send a REFRESH command to the channel. NOTHING: Leave all channels at their current state.

parameter.name: outputDisconnectAction
parameter.label: Output Channel Disconnect Action
parameter.description: When a pigpiod disconnect is encountered. The desired action to perform on outputs. SETUNDEF: Set all configured channels to UNDEF. NOTHING: Leave all channels at their current state.

parameter.name: outputReconnectAction
parameter.label: Output Channel Reconnect Action
parameter.description: When a pigpiod connection is re-established after being disconnected. The desired action to perform on outputs. REFRESH: Send a REFRESH command to the channel. NOTHING: Leave all channels at their current state.

channel-type.label: GPIO Digital Input
channel-type.description: Get digital state of a GPIO Pin

parameter.name: gpioId
parameter.label: GPIO Pin
parameter.description: GPIO pin to use as input

parameter.name: invert
parameter.label: Invert
parameter.description: Inverts the GPIO pin state from the channel state. Setting this to true can simulate an active low GPIO pin.

parameter.name: debouncingTime
parameter.label: Delay Time
parameter.description: Time in ms to double check if value hasn't changed. Be sure that the maximum latency of your network is not greater than two times this value.

parameter.name: pullupdown
parameter.label: Pull Up/Down Resistor
parameter.description: Configure Pull Up/Down Resistor of GPIO pin

parameter.name: edgeMode
parameter.label: Edge Detection Mode
parameter.description: Edge detection mode of the GPIO pin

channel-type.label: GPIO Digital Output
channel-type.description: Set digital state of a GPIO Pin

parameter.name: gpioId
parameter.label: GPIO Pin
parameter.description: GPIO pin to use as output

parameter.name: invert
parameter.label: Invert
parameter.description: Inverts the GPIO pin state from the channel state. Setting this to true can simulate an active low GPIO pin.

parameter.name: pulse
parameter.label: Pulse
parameter.description: Issues the pulse command after the given number of milliseconds. Used to pulse outputs.

parameter.name: pulseCommand
parameter.label: Pulse Command
parameter.description: The command to issue after the pulse duration to complete the pulse. Blink will alternate ON/OFF, useful for beacons or flashing leds.
